title: 8 gig patch @ 500 kbs/sec
body:
What is wrong  -- Did everything I could. Disable firewall, run as admin, etc.

How can I still be at 500 ..................

wait 450 and going down

replies.body: Let's go ahead and also make sure that your port forwarding and DNS settings are configured in the best way using this [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). You could also get a little faster speed by using an ethernet connection possibly.
